name: Alone in my House - This isn't home
name_original: Alone in my House - This isn't home
description: After a car accident your family decides to travel without you to let you heal in your house. But when they left, your Autophobia hits as soon as the lights go out. Try to make your way to the garage to turn on the lights, but be aware of what you see in your way. Don't try to think you're alone.
